summoned with #1171 Summon Rimvaettir (Conjuration 5)

When a Glacier calves a Niefel Giant, smaller shards of ice also break free. These are the Rimvaettir, small beings reminiscent of the Niefel Giants with whom they share their birth. Once they lived in the frozen lands of the Rimtursar. Now they emerge when called by the Jotun Skrattir, the Heralds of Winter.
